author: DutchFlyer
title: Cute little dog
review:
The Valentine's Puppy is a nice seasonal Brickhead, which fits the general theme of Valentine's Day very well: it is cute, carries a rose and a heart and is surrounded by flowers.

The build itself is quick, simple and fun. I like how the floppy ears are done. The rose is simple but effective. The heart piece is made from just 4 pieces. There are no spectacular colours visible, or truly special pieces. As an example of minimalist Brickheadz design, this is one of the very best: no special prints, no special pieces, perhaps some recolours maybe.

If you can get it, it is simply a fun set to get or gift.
